content: materials required regular baby yoda - small you ll need 3 different colours i ve used 4 seasons marvel in both 8 and 12 ply and 4mm hook 15mm safety eyes for baby yoda and a small bead for the frog finish project is 15cm tall ----------------------------------------------------------- huggable baby yoda - large you ll need 3 different colours i ve used 4 seasons marvel in both 8 and 12 ply 2 strands held together with 8mm hook 4 seasons marvel 12 ply in beige 4 seasons marvel 8 ply in brown and green 21mm safety eyes for baby yoda and 9mm safety eyes for the frog 4 seasons marvel 12 ply in blue for the frog with 4mm hook finished project is 26cm tall hands are pose-able if you insert a hairpin in between the stitches
